title: #231: Don't F**k with Cats, Part 5
description:
Laura, Jim and Lisa discuss the final episode of the Netflix break out series Don't F**k with Cats, 'Closing the Net.' Laura and Jim share their thoughts with Lisa about the killer's psychopathology, his previous offending behaviour, whether he had murder in mind from the start and much more. Please note we intentionally do not name the killer throughout our season.

#HisNameWasJunLin

#Prevention

#SerialAbusers

#VictimsMatter
